title: Oxon Cove  Park & Oxon Hill Farm: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger              Be A Junior Ranger      Our new Junior Ranger program is here. You can become a Junior Ranger by visiting the Oxon Cove Park Visitor Center and picking up the Junior Ranger activity book.  When you complete the exercises in the book you can show it to a park ranger to receive a certificate, badge, and patch.  This program will be geared for kids between the ages of 9 and 13.You can become a Junior Ranger at anytime by visiting the WebRangers online. Click here to go directly to this interactive site for ages 6 and up.  Â     Earn this patch, a badge, and a certificate by becoming an Oxon Cove Park Junior Ranger!
